frontmatter.title: My mental model for Heap Structure (Part 2)
frontmatter.description: Analysis, implementation and practical applications of Heap structure.

frontmatter.title: My mental model for Heap Structure (Part 1)
frontmatter.description: A heap is a binary tree holding a distinct relation between every parent and their nodes - a parent's value (or key) is always less than (min-heap) or greater than (max-heap) their children
